data.name: Gothica : The Devil's Shadow Demo
data.detailed_description:
Gothica : The Devil’s Shadow Demo is a seated VR demo experience with controller interactions and puzzle elements.

Set in Victorian England, you start your journey in a horse-drawn carriage, traveling down an old London Street. Listen carefully to the driver and follow his instructions.

Use detective work to figure out the puzzle and unlock the door. But beware, monsters may be lurking...
data.about_the_game:
Gothica : The Devil’s Shadow Demo is a seated VR demo experience with controller interactions and puzzle elements.

Set in Victorian England, you start your journey in a horse-drawn carriage, traveling down an old London Street. Listen carefully to the driver and follow his instructions.

Use detective work to figure out the puzzle and unlock the door. But beware, monsters may be lurking...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: HTC Vive, Oculus Rift or WMR VR headset is required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: HTC Vive, Oculus Rift or WMR VR headset is required.
